values.label: Transfer according to bilaterally agreed standards
values.comment: The transfer is to be executed according to bilaterally agreed standards.

values.label: Incoming international payment
values.comment: International payment that is incoming.

values.label: Outgoing international payment
values.comment: International payment that is outgoing.

values.label: Tax payment
values.comment: Payment of tax.

values.label: Incoming OCR (Optical Character Recognition) payment
values.comment: OCR (Optical Character Recognition) payment that is incoming.

values.label: Incoming retail direct debit
values.comment: Retail direct debit that is incoming.

values.label: Incoming corporate direct debit
values.comment: Corporate direct debit that is incoming.

values.label: Incoming paper-based payment
values.comment: Paper-based payment that is incoming.

values.label: Zero-balancing transaction
values.comment: Transaction that is zero-balancing.

values.label: Safe deposit box
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as relating to a safe deposit box.

values.label: Domestic money market
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being a money market transaction effected on a domestic exchange.

values.label: Foreign money market
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being a money market transaction effected on a foreign exchange.

values.label: Domestic bond market
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being a bond transaction effected in a domestic market.

values.label: International bond market
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being a bond transaction effected in a international market.

values.label: Funds
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being for funds.

values.label: Safe custody
values.comment: To identify a bank operation relating to safe custody.

values.label: Guarantee
values.comment: To identify a bank operation related to a guarantee.

values.label: Short foreign credits
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being for short credits granted to parties outside the bank's country.

values.label: Long foreign credits
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being for long credits granted to parties outside the bank's country.

values.label: Promissory note loan
values.comment: Promissory note type of loan.

values.label: Mortgage loan
values.comment: Mortgage type of loan.

values.label: Salary
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being for salary payments.

values.label: Incoming bankgiro
values.comment: Bankgiro that is incoming.

values.label: Automated bills of exchange
values.comment: The payment has been done by automated bills of exchange.

values.label: Returned direct debit
values.comment: To identify a bank operation as being for returning a direct debit. This is the refusal for technical reasons by a collecting bank to execute one or more transactions in a direct debit transfer request received from a creditor's bank.

values.label: Truncated paper based payment
values.comment: Truncated paper based payment is the financial operation of extracting data from a paper based payment.

values.label: Bills of exchange
values.comment: The payment has been done by bills of exchange.

values.label: Bankgiro
values.comment: The payment was originally made by bankgiro.

values.label: Bank draft
values.comment: Original payment was made by bank draft.

values.label: Bank initiated
values.comment: The fund transfer is initiated by a bank.

values.label: Cash letter
values.comment: The payment has been done by a cash letter.

values.label: Charges
values.comment: The fund transfer represents charges.

values.label: Cheque international
values.comment: The financial operation has been done by international cheque.

values.label: Cheque national
values.comment: The financial operation has been done by national cheque.

values.label: Clearing
values.comment: The financial operation has been done by a clearing system.

values.label: Collection
values.comment: The financial operation is collection.

values.label: Commission
values.comment: The fund transfer represents commission.

values.label: Cash concentration
values.comment: An aggregation of funds from different accounts into a single account.

values.label: Cash payment by post
values.comment: The financial operation has been done by cash payment by post.

values.label: Currencies
values.comment: Buying or selling of foreign notes.

values.label: Direct debit
values.comment: The financial operation is direct debit.

values.label: Deposit cash operation
values.comment: The financial operation is by deposit cash.

values.label: Foreign exchange
values.comment: The financial operation is by foreign exchange.

values.label: Free format giro
values.comment: System of credit transfer between banks, Post Offices, etc.

values.label: Interest
values.comment: The fund transfer represents usury.

values.label: Letter of credit
values.comment: The financial operation is a letter of credit.

values.label: Lockbox
values.comment: Type of cash management system offered by financial institutions to provide for collection of customers 'receivables'.

values.label: Miscellaneous
values.comment: The fund transfer is miscellaneous.

values.label: Payment card
values.comment: Relating to credit, debit, guarantee or charge card.

values.label: Postgiro
values.comment: The financial operation has been done by postgiro.

values.label: Point of sale
values.comment: The financial operation is point of sale.

values.label: Returned cheques
values.comment: The fund transfer represents returned cheques.

values.label: Returned items
values.comment: The fund transfer represents returned items.

values.label: Reference giro
values.comment: Payments was done by a special service, for low priority payments. Finnish national bank service.

values.label: Returned transfers
values.comment: The financial operation has been done by returned transfers.

values.label: Securities
values.comment: The fund transfer represents securities.

values.label: Standing order
values.comment: The financial operation is done by a standing order.

values.label: Traveller's cheque
values.comment: The financial operation is done by traveller's cheque.

values.label: Transfer
values.comment: The financial operation is done by transfer.

values.label: Urgent giro
values.comment: Payment was made by special bank service, for high priority payments. Finnish national bank service.

values.label: Value date adjustment
values.comment: The financial operation has adjusted value date.

values.label: Withdrawal cash operation
values.comment: The financial operation is a withdrawal cash operation.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: A temporary code which may be used between trading partners to describe a fund transfer whilst approval for a formal code value is being sought.
